body: Once per battle, the army may gain the aquatic, amphibious, climb, darkvision, flight, low-light vision, or scent special abilities, but loses the spellcasting ability while this is in effect. The army can end this ability in any later phase.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Kingdoms And War/Mass Combat/Special Abilities/Wild Shape (Druid 4)
name: Wild Shape (Druid 4)
